usernameRecovery.intro: Someone requested a list of all usernames registered to this email account ({{email}}). If this wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email.
usernameRecovery.listText: The usernames registered to this email are:
usernameRecovery.loginText: You can log in with any of the above usernames by visiting <2>our login page</2>.
usernameRecovery.preview: Someone requested a list of all usernames registered to this email account on ShieldBattery.
usernameRecovery.title: ShieldBattery Username Recovery
